text: Kulaŋ iamɨgali hɨhɨle nɨbɨlaŋ upɨ kɨlɨsɨ uitɨ agadɨ kɨlɨsɨ agɨlaŋ fi ukaci hɨvɨ mɨgalakɨlavɨvi me uamalɨ. Nɨbɨlaŋ ciaŋ igakɨla vica vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ mɨŋalɨvahɨdavi uamalɨ. Mɨŋalɨvadɨvaŋ lusɨŋ ukaci vihɨdavi agɨlaŋ upɨ kɨlɨsɨ uitɨ agɨlaŋ amɨŋ lamahɨdavi me vihɨdavi uamalɨ. Limu hɨhɨle 30 haman amɨŋ lamahɨdavi me uamalɨ. Limu hɨhɨle 60 haman amɨŋ lamahɨdavi me uamalɨ. Limu hɨhɨle 100 haman amɨŋ lamahɨdavi me uamalɨ.
